Package tr.edu.ku.ulgen.controller

Class HomePageController

java.lang.Object
tr.edu.ku.ulgen.controller.HomePageController
@RestController public class HomePageController extends Object
REST controller for handling the home page request. This class exposes an API endpoint for the root URL ("/") of the application.

  • Method Details

    • hello

      @GetMapping("/") public String hello()
      Returns a simple message when the root URL ("/") is accessed.
      Returns:
      a String containing the message to be displayed on the home page.

    • verifyEmail

      @GetMapping("/verify-email") public String verifyEmail(@RequestParam("token") String token)
      Verifies the user's email by the given token.
      Parameters:
      token - a String containing the email verification token.
      Returns:
      a String containing the result of the email verification process.

    • resendEmailVerification

      @PostMapping("/resend-email-verification") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<VerifyEmailResponse> resendEmailVerification(@RequestBody ResendEmailVerificationDto resendEmailVerificationDto)
      Resends the email verification message to the specified email address.
      Parameters:
      resendEmailVerificationDto - A ResendEmailVerificationDto containing the email address.
      Returns:
      A org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<VerifyEmailResponse> containing the result of the email resend process.

    • forgotPassword

      @PostMapping("/forgot-password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForgotPasswordResponse> forgotPassword(@RequestBody ForgotPasswordDto forgotPasswordDto)
      Initiates the forgot password process for the specified email address.
      Parameters:
      forgotPasswordDto - A ForgotPasswordDto containing the email address.
      Returns:
      A org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForgotPasswordResponse> containing the result of the forgot password process.

    • resetPassword

      @PostMapping("/reset-password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResetPasswordResponse> resetPassword(@RequestBody ResetPasswordDto resetPasswordDto)
      Resets the user's password using the provided token and new password.
      Parameters:
      resetPasswordDto - A ResetPasswordDto containing the password reset token and the new password.
      Returns:
      A org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResetPasswordResponse> containing the result of the password reset process.
